university_name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)
gpt_university_description: KAIST is a leading research university located in Daejeon, South Korea. Established in 1971, it focuses on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) education and research. The university is renowned for its contributions to various fields, such as information technology, biotechnology, robotics, and advanced materials.
